TopicTitle: Contract to recover a Kerbinaut and their ship from orbit

Articles.Content:
I have a contract which requires the rescue of a Kerbinaut and as well their ship.

I've rescued the Kerbinaut, but I can't figure out how to return the ship to Kerbin safely.

The grabber won't grab, I can't put the capsule into a cargo bay and return it.

Are there any ideas how?

Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T23:16:00Z" title="05/18/2015 11:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by KeithS**
  
Solution found
Transfer fuel and fly it back?

It's a one Kerbal capsule, no engines or anything.

The contract is from StrutCo, but using struts doesn't seem to solve the issue either.
The grabber should work. You may need to dock at slightly higher speed than you would using docking ports, about 0.5m/s or higher, to get it to activate against a light object though.

Okay... 

\*goes off to try ramming speed\*

- - - Updated - - -

Needed just over 2 m/s for the grabber to latch onto the capsule.

Thanks for the help!
